column.Name: AutoColor
column.alias: <input type='checkbox' ID='cbSelectAll' alt='Select All' OnClick='CheckAllAutoColor(this);' value='select' / > AC

column.Name: MaterialDEL
TradePartnerVendorID
column.lookupquery: SELECT '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as TradePartnerVendorID, '' as VendorName UNION SELECT distinct TradePartnerVendorID, VendorName FROM vwx_BOMMaterialTradePartnerVendor_SELECT WHERE Active = 1
